description: Police say they found a huge online network after arresting a man who shared images of child abuse.
title: Germany investigates 30,000 suspects over paedophile network
title_page: Germany investigates 30,000 suspects over paedophile network - BBC News
maintext: In May a 27-year-old soldier linked to the network was sentenced to 10 years in prison and placed in a psychiatric hospital for an indefinite period of time.
